member.name: T:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.DirectX.PlaybackThrottler
member.summary: Throttles the playback calls to the VideoPlayer component to happen only when needed. Needed is when; - The speed is changed. - The time is changed more than deffined by the speed (e.g. during skip gaps). - The maximum time between the playback calls are reached (for synchronizing the playback time)

member.name: F:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.DirectX.PlaybackThrottler.MaxUpdatedSignalInterval
member.summary: Defines the maximum time between the update signal.

member.name: F:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.DirectX.PlaybackThrottler.TimeJumpDetectionThresshold
member.summary: Defines the time jump detection thresshold

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.DirectX.PlaybackThrottler.HasTimeJumped(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Double)
member.summary: Detects if time has jumped or not.

member.name: T:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.ServerConfigurationEnum
member.summary:
Define how servers in a Master/Slave setup should be added.
Is only relevant for Enterprise and Profesional products

member.name: F:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.ServerConfigurationEnum.MasterAndSlaves
member.summary:
Add the master as one server and all slaves as recorders under the master server.
Note that some functions and features cannot be used on the slaves.

member.name: F:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.ServerConfigurationEnum.MasterOnly
member.summary: Only add the identified server. The slaves can be added later by use of Site information and hierarchy.

member.name: F:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.ServerConfigurationEnum.AllServersIndividually
member.summary:
Add identified server, and all all slaves as individual server as well. All servers will appear on top level.
Use this option when MIP configuration is stored on each server, and needs to be retrieved.

member.name: F:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.ServerConfiguration
member.summary:
Define how the servers should be added during the login process.
The default value is MasterAndSlaves

member.name: P:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.AutoLogin
member.summary: Set this to true if you like the autologin tick mark to be set at start

member.name: P:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.DisableAutoLogin
member.summary:
Set this property to false, if the AutoLogin is already ticked to on, but should be ignored this time.
This property should be used when the application has already logged on automatically, and the user need to logout/login to provide new server address or credentials.

member.name: P:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.EnsureDomain
member.summary: If set to true the current domain will automatically be added to the user name if no domain is provided

member.name: P:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.LoginLogoImage
member.summary:
Set this Image to have your own image at top of the login dialog.
Ideal size is 469x62 pixels, but will be streached to fit.

member.name: T:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.SetLoginResultDelegate
member.summary: A callback method for setting how the login performed.

member.name: M:VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.#ctor(VideoOS.Platform.SDK.UI.LoginDialog.DialogLoginForm.SetLoginResultDelegate)
member.summary: Initialize the login dialog, and set the callback method for setting the result of the entire login process.
